title: Taylor Hill is Lancôme's Newest Face - Victoria's Secret Model Taylor Hill is Lancôme's New Ambassador
text: The Victoria's Secret model follows in Jasmine Tookes' footsteps. Victoria's Secret Angel Taylor Hill can now add beauty ambassador to her resume. The 20-year-old model announced her new role via Instagram this morning. The youngest VS Angel, and a runway regular at Chanel, Givenchy, and more, Hill joins a handful of other beautiful and powerful women in the Lancôme family, including Lupita Nyong'o, Julia Roberts, Penelope Cruz, and VS bestie Jasmine Tookes. "I am very excited and honored to join Lancôme," Hill says. "I love the vision behind this feminine brand.
